title: [Large-Scale] Online Social Studies Instructional Strategy Using IMS Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental experience in operating online learning platforms and comprehension of social studies foundational theories
context.additional_context: IMS LD-based project management and collaboration emphasis in BYOD environments

learning_goals: Learners can design three or more interaction scenarios using the IMS LD structure.
Students can operate a group-based learning progress tracking system with 90% accuracy using IMS LD tools.
Participants can complete the material distribution-feedback-resubmission process two or more times in an online environment.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
